name: Suretek Infosoft
tagline: Welcome to the Country of Software Development.
description:
Suretek Infosoft provides one stop optimum and customized software solutions made for your organization. Depending on the size and field of an organization, we have countless solutions to meet a multitude of requirements. We’re justifiably proud of the team we’ve assembled.
Initially numbering just two programmers, Suretek has grown steadily and now has over 50 staff members.The team is made up of highly-qualified, talented and innovative IT professionals each with their own area of expertise. Their experience spans the full range of custom software development, from small entrepreneurial projects to complex systems for large-scale enterprises.
Core Competencies:
Custom Software development
Web Development
Mobile App Development (Native and Hybrid Environment)
AR/VR Product Development
Ai-based Application development
Blockchain/Cryptocurrency development
Software product realization
Porting and migration services
Quality/Testing Services
Maintenance and customization services
